title: Hehehe:

i don't remeber you; but boy!!! Cute Picture!!!

title: Re: Hehehe:

Damn thats a cute picture. It even borders of kyoote [but only with two 'o's]

I must admit, Keen looks younger [and Spot pint sized. I'll bet Norp is bigger.]

BTW: Hehe, his nose is only suggested, his pink shirt makes him look gay and everyone here hates you go away and kill yourself.

title: Re: New FANART
content:
HA! I got you to post it! I knew my mind control techniques were still working![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img]

But I won't repeat myself. You already know what I think of this pic. Although it's nice to see that someone besides me draws Yorps with the teeth coming out of the top. Personally I think they look cuter that way. I hope you make more stuff.-----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: [img]http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/5541/newteaserdarker1xh.png[/img]

title: Toothy.
content:
Crazy stuff. If he's meant to look that age, he really shouldn't have a yorp, since he doesn't head to Mars until age 8... but, whatever--still a brilliant work of fanart.

[hr]Galaxieretter Although it's nice to see that someone besides me draws Yorps with the teeth coming out of the top. Personally I think they look cuter that way.
[hr]I've always done the same. Probably because, IIRK, Spot is drawn that way in the Keen2 ending sequence. Even though I've since realised they don't appear that way in Keen1, I still normally draw/sculpt the tooth at the top, though sometimes just for the sake of doing something different I'll put it in the lower jaw.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Yup...
content: THanks all^^ but yeah its just my style which might be hard to grasph at times... but yeah the idea was this pic was based on  the aftermath of at LEAST Marooned on Mars game, probably after the 3rd game, so he may look 3 to a few people but its just my style, that and i intended him to look 8 but "Cute" thanks^^
